summary: The document is an Amended and Restated Credit Agreement dated November 17, 2025, involving The Sherwin-Williams Company, various lenders, and Citicorp USA, Inc. as both the Administrative Agent and Issuing Bank. It amends and restates a prior credit agreement from May 9, 2016, outlining terms for a revolving credit and letter of credit facility, including definitions, commitments, borrowing procedures, representations, warranties, and covenants. The agreement also covers events of default, administrative agent responsibilities, and miscellaneous provisions such as notices, amendments, and governing law.
